Title: Html To RichTextBox
Description: HtmlToRichTextBox is a plain libary for Converting html code into the RichTextBox.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
HtmlToRichTextBox is a plain libary for converting html code into the Silverlight RichTextBox.

Example

string html =GetHtml();
var htb = new HtmlToRichTextBox(html);
htb.ApplyHtmlToRichTextBox(richTextbox);
